headline: Onex Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: Convex generates record annual results including $711 million in net incomeAll amounts in U.S. dollars unless otherwise stated TORONTO, Feb. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Onex Corporation (TSX: ONEX) today announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and year ended December 31, 2025. headline: Supreme Court Trump tariff decision impact: What to expect as fight for billions in refunds begins
summary: The Supreme Court ruling that President Trump's tariffs are illegal will lead companies to seek billions in refunds, but the decision was silent on the issue.
